prayer.title: 🕊️ Morning Prayer
prayer.parsha_theme: dreams, building from nothing, divine protection
prayer.modeh_ani: מודה אני לפניך — I gratefully thank You, living and eternal King, for returning my soul within me with compassion.
prayer.blessing: Blessed are You who spreads the earth upon the waters — ground me in stability.
prayer.psalm: Psalm 127:1: "Unless the Lord builds the house, the builders labor in vain."
prayer.proverb: Proverbs 3:5-6: "Trust in the Lord with all your heart; lean not on your own understanding."
prayer.intention: Let today's small faithfulness lead to tomorrow's greater stewardship.
prayer.closing: May your work today be a pleasing offering. May your rest tonight be deep and restorative.

family.title: ❤️ Family Focus
family.suggestion: Build a Super Wings runway with Jones using pillows and blankets — he can be Jett, you can be Paul calling out missions. Jett (6mo) can watch and practice tummy time nearby.
family.conversationStarter: Ask Jillian: What book are you reading right now? Is it grabbing you?
family.weeklyGoal: Monthly date night is coming up — start thinking about what she'd enjoy. Dinner somewhere new, or a concert?
family.potencyAction: ⚡ PRIORITY: Acknowledge what happened without defending: 'You're right, I shouldn't have...' (Relationship temp is critical — 1.5 ratio, needs repair)
family.reflection: The relationship analysis shows you're in repair mode. Today isn't about being right — it's about being present. Acknowledge, don't defend. Quality time with her matters more than productivity today.
